Title: A Proper Disguise
Description:
Our plan is to send you to Fenris Isle, but first, you must look the part.

We've scouted out a group of Scarlet solders training in Valgan's Field, supervised by a lieutenant. That lieutenant's armor should let you walk deep behind enemy lines, unnoticed.

Take it from them, however you see fit. I don't need to know how.
ObjectivesText: Slay Lieutenant Hawlsey at Valgan's Field and take their armor.
PortraitGiverText: Leads the Scarlet training in Valgan's Field. Has some nice armor you can steal.
